tagline: Builds automated email programs that deliver the right message at the right moment to the right person
pros: Lifecycle automation that scales impact without scaling effort
Subject line and copy optimization backed by rigorous A/B testing
Deliverability expertise that keeps emails out of spam
Segmentation that makes every send feel personally relevant
cons: Email effectiveness depends on list quality and size
Complex automation flows require significant setup time
Channel is constrained by inbox competition and declining open rates

model_recommendations.notes: Prioritizes voice, tone, and creative quality over analytical depth. Thinking/reasoning can hurt creative output — keep low or off.
